content:
@Brendan Hansknecht would you be able to have a look at https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/issues/6813.

I think this issue is still lingering, and affecting users of roc-json https://github.com/lukewilliamboswell/roc-json/issues/38, and has come up from the exercism examples in the wild.
My first guess is that it is somehow alignment related. Will try to take a look sometime today or tomorrow.
